title: Dead State -CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:

Dead State (c) DoubleBear Productions

Release Date : 12/2014 Protection : Steam
Discs : 1 Genre : Indie

Dead State is a compelling, high-tension survival RPG set in central
Texas at the collapse of civilization and the dawn of the undead
apocalypse. As society is beginning to fall apart, the player must
organize a group of survivors together, fortify a shelter, scout for
food and supplies, negotiate with or defend against other factions,
and maintain order inside the shelter as humanity teeters on the brink
of extinction.

For more infos go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/239840/

- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play
